trends: There have been 4 other sightings in McGregor
There were no other sightings in McGregor on or around
divs: Sighting DetailsON SATERDAY NITE OF AUGUST THE 15TH 2009 I WENT OUT ON MY BACK PORCH AND THESE ARE THE EVENTS THAT UNFOLDED.I WAS GOING OUTSIDE TO SMOKE AND I WAS LOOKING UP IN THE SKY BECAUSE I HAD SEEN A MEADOR SHOWER A FEW NITES BEFORE AND WANTED TO SEE IF THERE WOULD BE ANY SHOOTING STARS.AS I LOOKED UP OVER MY TREELINE I SAW THREE LIGHTS IN A TRIANGLE PATTERN THAT I FIRST THOUGHT WHERE STARS.AFTER LOOKING AT IT FOR ABOUT FIVE MINUTES I REALIZED THAT THEY WERE IN THE WRONG SPOT TO BE STARS.AFTER SITTING IN DISBELIEF AT WHAT I WAS SEEING I REALIZED THAT I MAY BE LOOKING AT A UFO.I WENT INTO THE HOUSE AND WOKE MY WIFE UP AND TOLD HER TO COME OUTSIDE AND LOOK AT WHAT I WAS LOOKING AT.SHE CAME OUT AND WITNESSED IT ASWELL.THE OBJECT SEEMED TO BE AT LEAST A HALF OF MILE WIDE AND HAD A PULSATING LIGHT IN THE MIDDLE LIGHT THAT SEEMED TO CHANGE COLORS.THERE WHERE 3 LIGHTS.IT NEVER BROKE FORMATION THE WHOLE TIME I SAW IT.IT DID HOWEVER MOVE.IT FINELEY MOVED OUT OF MY LINE OF SITE AT 12:19 AM AUGUST 16TH 2009.I CALLED SEVERAL OF MY FRIENDS AT THE TIME OF THE EVENT AND ASKED THEM TO GO OUTSIDE AND SEE IF THEY COULD SEE ANYTHING.NO LUCK.SO WHAT IM WONDERING IS DID ANYONE ELSE SEE THE UFO IN THE WACO AREA THAT MAYBE SAW WHAT I DID.I'VE ALSO CAN TELL YOU I'VE SEEN LOTS OF AIRCRAFT IN MY LIFE AND THIS WAS NOT SOME AIRCRAFT FLYING IN FORMATION.THE EVENT WAS TO LONG FOR SOMEONE TO FLY IN A PERFECT TRIANGLE FOR THAT AMOUNT OF TIME AND TO SLOWLEY FADE OUT OF MY LINE OF SITE SOME FORTY FOUR MINUTES LATER.ANYWAY PLEASE INFORM ME IF THERE WHERE OTHERS WHO SAW THIS EVENT.
Summary: I SAW A TRIANGLE SHAPED OBJECT FROM MY BACK PORCH THAT WASENT LIKE ANYTHING IVE EVER SEEN.
